alert.note: Alert for Bath (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued April 17 at 3:16PM EDT until April 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Bath County. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, until 8 PM EDT this evening. For the Frost Advisory, from 3 AM to 9 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft, through early evening. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered, late tonight into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: For the Lake Wind Advisory, boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft. For the Frost Advisory, take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
